data: `minecraft:behavior.float_wander` allows an entity to float around in a random direction, similar to the `ghast` entity.

data.Name: float_duration
data.Description: Range of time in seconds the mob will float around before landing and choosing to do something else

data.Name: must_reach
data.Description: If true, the point has to be reachable to be a valid target

data.Name: random_reselect
data.Description: If true, the mob will randomly pick a new point while moving to the previously selected one

data.Name: xz_dist
data.Description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1

data.Name: y_dist
data.Description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1

data.Name: y_offset
data.Description: Height in blocks to add to the selected target position
